attributes.action: Make St George's Day a National Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: St Patricks day in England is full of people drinking Guinness, waving the Irish flag and wearing oversized hats. But, St George's Day can pass without mention. England needs a day it can be proud of. The USA has Independence Day, Ireland has St Patricks day etc. England should have a public holiday, St George's Day. On this day we celebrate England, its traditions, its history and everything that is positive and good about our nation. Come on England!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
